ckMdlData Class Reference
[ckDraw -- Graphics module]

A 3D Model data, which is used by 3D models. More...

Detailed Description

A 3D Model data, which is used by 3D models.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum ckMdlData::ModelDataMode

The modes of the model data.

Enumerator:
MODE_READ  Read-only mode.

MODE_WRITE  Read and write mode.
